message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40!
Your offer wasn't unfair, but I think an even split is the most straightforward way to ensure we both benefit.
I see you want an even split, but I think I can do a bit better. Meet me in the middle of my first offer?

Alice, let's be reasonable. We both lose if we don't agree. An even split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
